Main Content Region



Academic Advising









Advising at CSUSB
Undergraduate students can meet with an advisor for a brief 10-minute session in person or virtually to answer questions and guide them to relevant resources. Some advising sessions may require more time; in those cases, your advisor may recommend a scheduled appointment for a future date.
Please note that the schedule is subject to change without notice due to availability.
Join via Zoom or come in person to UH-329.
 

Drop-In Schedule


Day
Time


Monday
9:00 AM – 4:00 PM


Tuesday
9:00 AM – 4:00 PM


Wednesday
9:00 AM – 4:00 PM


Thursday
9:00 AM – 4:00 PM


Friday
9:00 AM – 4:00 PM



 




Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)


Q. How do I meet with an Academic Advisor?

Academic Advising is available Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 4 PM in-person and via zoom (except on Holidays and Campus Closures). After attending a drop-in meeting, you can request an appointment for a future date.





Q. Who do I speak to if I'm interested in attending CSUSB?

The Office of Admissions & Student Recruitment meets with students interested in visiting or applying to CSUSB. For more information or to schedule a pre-application appointment, please visit Apply to CSUSB.





Q. Who advises Graduate Students?

The Graduate Coordinator of your program will serve as your academic advisor. Please visit Graduate Studies' Degrees and Department Contact List.



 




CSUSB Advising Podcast
Join Matt Markin and his CSUSB friends as they bring you the latest advising updates at Cal State San Bernardino! Each episode is made explicitly for you, the CSUSB students, and your parents. The podcast aims to provide relevant advising tips and on-campus interviews.
 

Subscribe on your favorite podcasting platforms.
 
Listen on Buzzsprout
Listen on Apple Podcasts
